name: Gary the World Eater
description:
Gary the World Eater

is a short high-score chasing mini game with lots of explosions. You try to survive for as long as possible and beat your own personal best score

Click/Touch and drag your mouse/finger to move Gary around
Blow up grass for seeds and eat them to slow down the TNT

This is a Hermitcraft Fangame.
Hermitcraft is a group of friends playing Minecraft together on a server https://hermitcraft.com

It is not required to know Hermitcraft to enjoy the game, though it would make the theming less confusing :D
Here is a YouTube playlist about this particular event if you are interested playlist

Have fun and I would love it if you post how far you made it.
